price: (54) Eat [therefrom] and pasture your livestock. Indeed in that are signs for those of intelligence.
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱرۡعَوۡاْ أَنۡعَٰمَكُمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلنُّهَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ir'ʿaw anʿāmakum inna fī dhālika laāyātin li-ulī al-nuhā
